page.title: 11POLITICS: NORTHWEST PENRITH
page.content: The people in this area are mostly Conservative because it is farming area.It has been with this party for 34 years,in the last election they almost lost it to the Liberal party. The Poll was as follows: David Maclean (Conservative) 17,530 Michael Young (SDP) 16,978 Lindsay Williams (Labour) 2,834 Lord David Sutch 412 Eric W.Morgan 150 Helen Anscomb 72 John Connell 62 Peter Smith 35 The minority candidates stood for an interesting variety of causes: (in the same order as above) The Official Monster Raving Looney Party,Independent/Liberal/Labour-Coop, Death off Roads(Freight On Rail),Independent Socialist:Peace,& New National Party.TURNOUT 54.7%
